divs: Sighting Detailsmy son and i were outside looking at the stars because i had noticed some "strange stars", a few minutes earlier. my son told me i was seeing heicopters or some other "normal" air traffic.we were about to go in when something looked like it blurred the stars out as it went over us straight and silent. it took about 20 seconds for it to continue to the horizon from where we had first noticed it just about to go over us. at arms length it was the size of your hand. it had no visable outer lights but my son and i agreed on it looked lit as if it had windows around the perimiter emitting light.also ,the back of it had no visable end. as if it were a "mirage" thnks for listning. was the wierdest thing i have seen yet.my son agrees...
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Highland
There were no other sightings in Highland on or around February 12th 2009
